DOC.brief_summary: Human milk ( HM ) consider gold standard nutrient infant , contains lot beneficial nutrient prebiotics lactoferrin . Previous study show prebiotics lactoferrin play important role generate bifidobacteria-dominated colonic microflora.The purpose study investigate stool characteristic , acceptability , gastrointestinal tolerance term infant feed start infant formula supplement prebiotics lactoferrin .
DOC.brief_title: The Impact Prebiotics Lactoferrin Containing Infant Formula Stool Characteristics Healthy Term Infants
DOC.detailed_description: Human milk ( HM ) consider gold standard nutrient infant , contains lot beneficial nutrient prebiotics lactoferrin . Previous study show prebiotics lactoferrin play important role generate bifidobacteria-dominated colonic microflora well intestinal immune system . The purpose study investigate stool characteristics（including intestinal microbiota） acceptability , gastrointestinal tolerance infant feed start infant formula supplement prebiotics lactoferrin , compare data infant exclusively breast feeding .
DOC.criteria: fullterm birth weight ≥2,500 g good health without symptom diarrhea , receive antibiotic least 1 week enrollment exclusively feed breast milk infant formula preterm infant know disease currently take medication drug mixed feeding symptom diarrhea receive antibiotic within 1 week
